forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds by afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain this morning. Breaks of sun this afternoon. High 59F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. NE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 58F. NE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
